title: DATA_FILE- CONFIRM SOURCE FILES RECEIVED IN THE TARGET DIRECTORY
time_sequence: CA - FILES RECEPTION AND PARENT FILES INTEGRATION

task_list.instruction_title:
Confirm with SPOC_INTEGRATION team the following 228 x source files arriving from SGÂ 
_- MiCA files
- Olympic files
- VEGA files
- MANUAL files
- AAA files
- Others (CAS, SUN, Synergy, etc.)
IN CASE OF STRUCTURAL CHANGE, PAUSE MIGRATION WITH IT_CUTOVER AND ORGANISE EMERGENCY REVIEW WITH DATA GOVERNANCE.
IN CASE OF OTHER DISCREPANCY COMPARED TO MANIFEST: MEETING WITH IT_MANAGEMENT FOR GO/NOGO
CONFIRM ALL RECEIVED FILES WITH NO NAME ERROR/NO VOLUME DISCREPANCY / NO STRUCTURAL CHANGE (based on the manifest 6999 File)
